lines.text: Oh my God! Frosty killed Kenny!
Dude, I told you not to put that fucking hat on Frosty's fucking head now, didn't I?
Well, I'm sorry, Mr. rocket fucking scientist!
You know, thanks to you there's not gonna be any Christmas, and there's no one left to help us.
I'm sure glad that's over with.
[the boys refer to Jesus after seeing him defeat Frosty]
My sister in, in Minnesota put a hat on a snowman, and it tried to kill her.
Fuck him, let's do it anyway.
